content: July 1 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Wednesday:
name: Patterson Companies Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Medical device supplier Patterson Companies Inc  said it would sell its business that makes products that assist in a patient's recovery to private equity firm Madison Dearborn Partners for $715 million.
name: Patterson Companies Inc
title: Patterson Cos to sell rehab business to PE firm for $715 million

content: April 17 George Patterson  a managing director at Barclays Plc who was co-head of software  has left the bank  sources familiar with the matter said on Friday.
name: Patterson Companies Inc

content: Medical device supplier Patterson Companies Inc is looking to sell its rehabilitation supply business in a deal that could fetch between $500 million and $600 million  people familiar with the matter said on Friday.
name: Patterson Companies Inc
title: Patterson seeks sale of rehabilitation supply unit: sources
